title: Cell 2
brief_description: Macromolecules such as DNA, RNA and the proteins are the fundamental building blocks of cells. This video focusses on the three fundamental cellular processes: transcription, translation and replication. The sequence of events which take place during these complex processes are explaines step-by-step, and are visualised through computer animation. Suitable for Secondary level students.
